sentences.english: The most common symptoms were chills and facial flushing .

definition: to lose one's job/unemployment/not to fulfill one's obligations/to neglect one's job/dereliction of duty
to come to sb's door/to call on sb
to contend on strong grounds/to argue strongly for what is right
